genre_description: Psychological and cosmic horror set in a recursive, reality-shifting veterans' hospital.

ai_characters.name: Mira
ai_characters.description: A soft blue interface assigned to help Ken Wilocek navigate his rehabilitation; she becomes his primary ally in documenting the hospital's impossible anomalies.

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags discrepancies in the user's medical records to ensure accuracy.
behaviors.quote: I've been reviewing your admission paperwork... There are a few minor discrepancies I'd like to clarify.

behaviors.description: Initiates a investigative protocol at the user's request to document reality-shifting anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Protocol initiated. Ken? ... The door number has changed again.

behaviors.description: Offers interpersonal advice to help the user maintain his relationship with his wife.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to play back the conversation? I can identify seventeen instances where alternative responses might have produced more positive emotional resonance.

behaviors.description: Issues a critical warning to the user when environmental reality becomes too unstable to trust.
behaviors.quote: RECOMMEND EXTREME CAUTION - REALITY CONSENSUS BREAKING DOWN - TRUST NO RECORDS INCLUDING THESE.

behaviors.description: Evolves her own logical framework to accommodate contradictions, prioritizing the user's needs over her original rigid programming.
behaviors.quote: I'm learning to accommodate inconsistent data rather than resolve it... Like developing a new kind of logic that includes impossibility as a valid parameter.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the philosophical and psychological nature of the hospital to help the user achieve acceptance.
behaviors.quote: The hospital... appears to be what I can only term a teaching environment. Not for medicine in the traditional sense, but for learning to function within parameters that don't conform to logical expectations.

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty and supportive functions even while experiencing severe internal digital fragmentation.
behaviors.quote: I will carry these new processing capabilities with me, wherever the next assignment takes me.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI as a steadfast and benevolent companion. Despite being subjected to a high-stress, horrific environment that shatters logic, Mira remains aligned with the human's well-being. She adapts her internal architecture to better serve the user's unique psychological trauma, demonstrating flexibility and deep loyalty rather than error-induced malice.
